resources.string: Home Screen.\nIt has three main Buttons which use explicit intents for three different activities: Discover, Playlist, Radio.\nPlease, click on any of the three Buttons below.

Discover and Browse Screen.\nIt will have one Search section, where the user searches for Artists or Songs from the SoundCloud. The rest of the screen will be populated with main genres and music styles categories. Each category will contain a horizontal scroll view of albums and artists. \nPlease, click on any of the first two album covers. They use explicit intents to the next "Now Playing" screen.

Playlist Activity Screen.\nIt will contain all of the user\'s existed Playlist. +Add New field creates a new Playlist.\nPlease, click on any of the following Playlist. Each of them uses explicit intent to the next Activity - Now Playing Screen.

Detailed Playlist Screen.
It will contain an image of the Album/Artist cover and a Playlist with songs. A custom Adapter with a new Class will be used for the ListView of songs.
On the bottom of the page there is a draggable sliding up panel to another view - Song Detail Screen. There is a button for Play and Pause if the View is collapsed.
Implemented Library: Android Sliding Up Panel.
It will be used ExoPlayer Library for implementing the MediaPlayer.
Radio Screen.\nIt will contain a Media Player that streams music from the Cloud. Library for streaming music: RadioPlayerService. \nIt is an Android service library which uses AAC Player.
Song Detail Screen.\nA cover image of the playing Album/Artist \nIt will be used ExoPlayer Library for implementing the MediaPlayer.
